capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Dudley before and I have to say, he can come across as pretty self-centered. He has a bit of a reputation for putting his own needs first, which might be perceived as being quite selfish at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. how old is dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's actually 11 years old. I'm pretty sure that's right, but at the same time, I've seen him look a bit younger sometimes, so it's possible that might be an estimate or something. Overall, I think he's definitely around that age, which is really cute!
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the typical male name for someone named dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out that he's a guy. I mean, it's pretty clear-cut, you know? He's definitely a male.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i didn't know that you're a guy, daniela!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Snape's character in the Harry Potter series and it's really interesting to note that he's depicted as a male. I mean, it's not like J.K. Rowling just made it up for the sake of being different, there are actually some historical and cultural influences that might have contributed to this portrayal.
capsules_submitted.reply: great! so, snape is also a male, just like dudley.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out he's a guy. I mean, it's not surprising really, but still nice to know, you know? He seems like a pretty cool dude, and being a man doesn't define him or anything. But yeah, that's just something about him, and I'm glad I got to learn more about him.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is dudley's age?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to someone about Harry and they mentioned that he's 11 years old. Now, I'm not entirely sure if that's true, but it seems possible. I mean, I've seen him in the news before, and he does look like a kid around that age.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to someone about Harry and they mentioned that he's a male. And I completely agree with that, I'm certain it's true.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's definitely one of the tallest people in our school. I mean, he towers over most of the professors, let alone students like me. It's quite impressive, actually.
